text:
#Vaccine #Coronavirus #HIV #COVID19 #AIDS 

Yet another #mRNA vaccine in third-phase trials could be even better, because it will be far cheaper. 
@robin_shattock's "Self-amplifying RNA" vaccine may require as little as 1/100 of the amount of vaccine.
